parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.34

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Ropes and Sling Loading

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return rope length in meters (set by [[ropeCreate]], [[ropeCut]], [[ropeUnwind]]).
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Informative</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Returned rope length will remain the same, even if the rope is stretched.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[ropeLength]] rope

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> rope: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>_length = [[ropeLength]] ([[ropes]] heli1 [[select]] 0);</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ropes]], [[canSlingLoad]], [[enableRopeAttach]], [[getSlingLoad]], [[ropeAttachedObjects]], [[ropeAttachTo]], [[ropeDestroy]], [[ropeUnwound]], [[ropeAttachedTo]], [[ropeCreate]], [[ropeDetach]], [[ropeAttachEnabled]], [[ropeCut]], [[ropeEndPosition]], [[ropeUnwind]], [[setSlingLoad]], [[slingLoadAssistantShown]]
</value></part></template>
